_meanings:
{@--2@} Any great
portentous calamity, or a portent
foreboding a great calamity.

{@--4@} The 
seventeenth of the astronomical Yogas.

{@--5@} The day of full-moon (when it
falls on a Monday).

{@--6@} A malignant
or evil aspect of the sun and moon
(considered to be inauspicious for
the performance of any action).
